statuses.text: I eventually got so good at the game that I was able to max out the scoreboard at 9,999,950 and I took a Polaroid (the original Instagram!) and mailed it to Nintendo who then printed my name in the Nintendo Fun Club and then eventually in the very first issue of Nintendo Power.
Probably the thing I most remember about Mario--that I really can't get out of my head no matter how hard I try--is his voice (played by Charles Martinet): "Itsa me, Mario!" "Hoo Hoo! 'ere we go!"
